details.access_and_opening_times:
About us

Visit our profile page for more about the work we do.

Opening hours

Due to security considerations, public access is by appointment only.

Telephone: 9am to 4pm Monday to Friday (excluding public holidays)

Emergency consular assistance following the death, hospitalisation, arrest, or other serious incident involving a British national is available 24 hours by calling +1 613 237 1530

Visa enquiries

  Service not offered at this location

Check if you need a visa or send an enquiry to UK Visas and Immigration.

Passports

  Service not offered at this location

Find out how to apply for a British passport or send an enquiry to Her Majesty’s Passport Office.

Services available by appointment in Ottawa

Make an appointment on-line for the following services, or contact us by telephone for further help.

Make an appointment for an Emergency Travel Document

Make an appointment for a notarial or documentary service

Disabled Access

Our offices are fully equipped with facilities for disabled visitors. If you need special assistance, please contact us before you arrange an appointment.

Press enquiries

Our press team answers media enquiries about the work of the UK government and the British High Commission in Ottawa. To contact the press team, please call +1 613 237 1530

UK Trade and Investment (UKTI)

UKTI helps UK-based companies succeed in the global economy. We also help overseas companies bring their high-quality investment to the UK’s dynamic economy, acknowledged as Europe’s best place from which to succeed in global business.

Public holidays in 2015

On the following public holidays, our office will be closed for normal business. Emergency consular assistance for British nationals is available by telephone.

Date Holiday
Thursday 1 January New Year’s Day
Monday 16 February Family Day
Friday 3 April Good Friday
Monday 6 April Easter Monday
Monday 18 May Victoria Day
Wednesday 1 July Canada Day
Monday 3 August Civic Holiday
Monday 7 September Labour Day
Monday 12 October Thanksgiving
Wednesday 11 November Remembrance Day
Thursday 24 December Christmas privilege day
Friday 25 December Christmas Day
Monday 28 December in lieu of Boxing Day

80 Elgin Street
Ottawa Ontario K1P 5K7

other.title: Media enquiries, British High Commission Ottawa

details.access_and_opening_times:
Where we are

We are located in downtown Ottawa on Elgin Street between Albert Street and Queen Street.

Parking

Unfortunately parking is not available at the high commission. You can find public parking spots nearby on Albert Street or Queen Street.

Bus

The following major bus routes travel near the high commission: 95, 96, 97, 85, 5. To plan a more personalised route consult OC Transpo’s website.

Disabled access to the high commission

For disabled persons, wheelchair access and assistance is available on request. Our main entrance is not accessible for wheelchair users. Please notify the security officer at the Albert Street entrance or call to advise staff of this requirement. A stair lift provides access to our ground floor conference room. It has a maximum weight allowance of 500 pounds. Lifts are available to all floors.

Office holidays

The high commission will be closed on the following public holidays during 2015.

Date Holiday
Thursday 1 January New Year’s Day
Monday 16 February Family Day
Friday 3 April Good Friday
Monday 6 April Easter Monday
Monday 18 May Victoria Day
Wednesday 1 July Canada Day
Monday 3 August Civic Holiday
Monday 7 September Labour Day
Monday 12 October Thanksgiving
Wednesday 11 November Remembrance Day
Friday 25 December Christmas Day
Monday 28 December in lieu of Boxing Day
